# VIC01 Cooling Upgrade 88/51 Wings: Request for Proposal

## Title
VIC01 Cooling Upgrade 88/51 Wings

## Brief Description
The National Research Council Canada is seeking proposals for the VIC01 Cooling Upgrade 88/51 Wings project. The project involves the installation of a new air conditioning system at the Dominion Astrophysical Observatory in Victoria, British Columbia.

## Tender Requirements
Tenders must be submitted by email only to [NRC.BidReceiving-ReceptiondesSoumissions.CNRC@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca][1]. The tender form and bid security must be included with the submission.

## Mandatory Site Visit
A site visit is mandatory for all bidders. The visit will be held on August 29 and 30, 2023, at 9:00 AM PST. Bidders must attend the designated date and time, and at least one representative from each firm must attend.

## Security Requirements
All bidders must possess a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Canadian Industrial Security Directorate (CISD). The bidder must also name all sub-contractors and provide their names, dates of birth, and security clearance certificate numbers within 72 hours of tender closing.

## Workplace Safety and Insurance Board (WSIB)
Tenders must also include a valid WSIB certificate.

## Contract Administration
The Office of the Procurement Ombudsman (OPO) will review any complaints regarding the administration of the contract. The parties agree to make every reasonable effort to settle disputes amicably through negotiations between the parties' authorized representatives.

## Tender Closing Date
The tender closing date is September 20, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT.

## Tender Results
The tender results will be sent to all contractors who submitted a tender after the closing date.

## Contact Information
For any inquiries or questions, please contact:
- Derek Mann, Departmental Representative
- Tania Backes, Contracting Authority

[1]: mailto:NRC.BidReceiving-ReceptiondesSoumissions.CNRC@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
